channel.title: Fix for the "Walk/Sprint" bug
channel.description:
Well every one probably noticed the walking bind will not work. I spent about an hour trying to figure out how to play because I am so used to the walk feature. I found out that the key bind were backwards (Walk key = Sprint key). So just replace the keys with the opposite key. I apologize if this only worked for me and doesn't work for you. I really hope that this bug gets fixed!
[b]Specs[/b]: Cpu: Intel Quad Core Q8300 Gpu: ATI Raedon 7770 Ram: Kingston 8GB

item.title: Fix for the "Walk/Sprint" bug
item.dc:creator: Reymond
item.description:
Sorry dude. It worked for me. once again I apologize.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix for the "Walk/Sprint" bug
item.dc:creator: Syex
item.description:
I’ve got sprint to work, it’s assigned to the ‘right shift’ button, however, I cannot get walk slowly to work. I’ve tried 'alt, ctrl, alt gr, and some others, all to no avail.

Read full topic

Well every one probably noticed the walking bind will not work. I spent about an hour trying to figure out how to play because I am so used to the walk feature.
